about_the_game:
Riot Ride is an arcade car-combat game with roguelike mechanics.

Drive a weaponized car through procedurally generated levels in a retro, Tron-like world.

Collect blueprints and deliver them back safely while fending off a variety of hacked vehicles trying to end your run.

Endless play styles

Scavenge weapons and buy passive items from the shop to survive. Use them to customize your car endlessly to further personalize your playstyle.

Challenging bosses

Face increasingly difficult bosses, each with unique attack patterns

Perma death

Play, die, learn, and repeat until you confront the final villain in a brutal showdown to finally break free from the simulation.

Features

  • Play up to 8 levels (There are 36 levels in the full game)

  • Use up to 17 unique weapons

  • Test 2 enemy types from the final game

  • Face off 2 bosses from the final game

  • If you die, you lose all your progress

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: Riot Ride is a car-combat roguelike where you play as a car in retro and Tron-like vibes. Speed, drift, and pull off the craziest maneuvers while crushing challenging enemies and bosses with endless synergies of weapons and items.
